${ModID}:StrengthStorm.NAME: Strength Storm
${ModID}:StrengthStorm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:UnlimitedPower.NAME: Unlimited Power
${ModID}:UnlimitedPower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power card, create an ethereal copy of it in you discard pile.
${ModID}:UnlimitedPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a power card, create an ethereal copy of it in you discard pile.

${ModID}:StrikeForm.NAME: Strike Form
${ModID}:StrikeForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, attack a random enemy for !D! damage.
